fn.p: In July 2010 the IASC Foundation was renamed the IFRS Foundation.
Until July 2010 the IFRS Foundation was named the IASC Foundation
Before March 2010 the Interpretations Committee was called the International Financial Reporting Interpretations Committee (IFRIC).
Before March 2010 the IFRS Advisory Council was called the Standards Advisory Council (SAC).
The Constitution was further revised in July 2002, June 2005, October 2007, January 2009, January 2010, January 2013 and December 2016.
Beginning no later than 30 June 2011 the IASB is required to carry out a public consultation on its agenda every three years.
With effect from 1 December 2016, the IASB is required to carry out a public consultation on its agenda every five years from the date of the most recent public agenda consultation.
